    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
   throws Exception
        Causes the helper to attempt to connect to MSMQ.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if difficulties are experienced forming a connection to the MSMQ server etc.

      • startQueue

        void startQueue(int access)
         throws Exception
        Starts the queue with the given access.
        Parameters:
        access - Either MSMQConstants.READ_ACCESS or MSMQConstants.WRITE_ACCESS
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • close

        void close()
    throws Exception
        Closes the queue manager and queue objects.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if difficulties are experienced closing the connection to the MSMQServer.

      • send

        void send(Object data)
   throws Exception
        Wrap given object up in an MSMQMessage and send it. String and byte[] objects are accepted.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to send.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is a problem sending the message.

      • receive

        byte[] receive()
        throws IOException
        Receive a message over MSMQ. The raw bytes sent in the message are returned.
        Returns:
        the body of the message retrieved from the queue.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem receiving the message.

      • setMSMQFormatName

        void setMSMQFormatName(String formatName)
        Sets the MSMQ format name (e.g., DIRECT=OS:.\private$\in).
        Parameters:
        formatName - the MSMQ queue formatName.

      • getMSMQFormatName

        String getMSMQFormatName()
        Accessor.
        Returns:
        the MSMQ server format name.

        void setIsTransactional(String isTransactional)
